channel.title: admin on Martín Varela
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Martín Varela

item.description: I am an seasoned and results-oriented R&D professional, with over 25 years of experience. I have participated in and managed a large number of large-scale R&D projects, both commercial and academic, at the national and European levels. My main field of expertise is Quality of Experience (QoE), which deals with how users experience the services they use. QoE is a very multidisciplinary field, spanning several technical domains such as networks, media, cloud, and web, as well as human aspects, including business.
